column1: EVTDESC_FAT.2;You have burrowed your way into the hearts and beds of many. You are now famously known for your love
column2: both in the house and out...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: EVTDESC_FAT.4;You have won countless victories. Your reputation in war and battle are the stuff of legends.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_FAT.6;Your armies are invincible! You have won hundreds of victories and become infamous for your indomitability.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column2: you are seen as a master of strategic warfare. Your mere name brings fear to any would be enemy..;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: EVTDESC_FAT.10;You've killed a few dozen people. More than enough to earn you notoriety as a master of shadows.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_FAT.12;You have won so many one on one fights that word has spread of your combat prowess.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_FAT.13;You have won the affection of so many people around you that your reputation alone earns you respect in diplomatic affairs.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
EVTDESC_FAT.16;Having trained up many successful students
column2: including several notable students in their own rights
column3: you are respected by many as a worthy teacher
column4: would be scholars vie for the opportunity to call you master.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: EVTDESC_FAT.17;In a world of chaos and strife
column2: you have managed to create a sturdy financial system that earns the envy of kings and commoners alike.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
